panels.description: The total number of websocket connections made to server. Always increasing.
panels.title: Total Websocket Connections

panels.description: The total number of state transitions per game state i.e. question -> voting page.
panels.title: State Transitions per Game State

panels.description: The average time we spent in each game state.
panels.title: State Transitions Duration per Game State

panels.description: The total number of errors we see in each game state.
panels.title: State Transitions Errors per Game State

panels.description: This graph displays the percentiles of state transitions. After receiving it on the channel.
panels.title: Game State Duration Percentiles

panels.description: The total number of messages we sent back to clients including the numbers of errors thrown.
panels.title: Total Message Sent

panels.description: The total messages received by type and also shows how many errors were thrown.
panels.title: Total messages received

panels.description: The total number of received messages, broken down by message type and the status i.e. success or failure.
panels.title: Message Received by Type and Status

panels.description: This graph displays the percentiles of sending messaages back to clients. After receiving it on the channel.
panels.title: Messages Sent Duration Percentiles

panels.description: The total number of times a player reconnects.
panels.title: Total Reconnect

panels.description: This graph displays the percentiles of state transitions. After receiving it on the channel.
panels.title: Game State Duration Percentiles

panels.description: This graph shows an average of the cpu usage usage between all pods/containers of the service.
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: This graph shows an average of the memory usage between all pods/containers of the service.
panels.title: Memory Usage (Bytes)

panels.description: Shows the logs for the service,
panels.title: Logs

panels.description: This graph shows total received bytes between all pods/containers of the service.
panels.title: Total Received Bytes

panels.description: This graph shows total transmitted bytes between all pods/containers of the service.
panels.title: Total Transmitted Bytes

panels.description: This graph shows total number of goroutines.
panels.title: Total Goroutines

panels.description: This graph shows allocated heap objects in Bytes.
panels.title: Memory Heap Allocated

panels.description: This graph breaks down HTTP methods vs Status Codes returned.
panels.title: HTTP Methods vs Status
